name: OOTS Readable
description: Makes the webcomic "Order of the Stick" easier to read by making the comic centered on page, removing all clutter and making the background a better color. Get this Greasemonkey userscript to be able to use your left/right arrow keys to navigate between comics.

user.name: wekateka
user.about:
Hey there, I am a European programmer, doing everything from robotics to web and game design. I am currently learning Japanese as a hobby, because of my interest in the culture and because I want to be able to enjoy the works of some authors untranslated.

Like most people nowadays, I use the internet. A fan of dark-ish UI themes, most bright sites will annoy my eyes and cause me to write themes that are a bit easier for me to look at. I received some requests for my themes, so I decided to sign up here at userscripts.org to share my themes with whoever wants them.
